sentence: Angela found it very rewarding to help Christine with their homework, which made _ feel thankful.
Angela decides to donate a kidney to Erin, which makes _ a really grateful person.
Logan told Adam that he could design a stage set for him.  _ was grateful.
Craig came over to Logan's house and helped him get stains out of his carpet.  _ was grateful.
Brian's hair always got big when it was humid. Dennis bought a dehumidifier to help. _ was grateful for the gesture.
The soap in the bathroom bothered Jennifer's skin, so Patricia replaced it with a different kind. _ felt grateful.
Jeffrey showed Joseph how to make a google doc on the computer.  _ was grateful.
Kevin just got a new bike from Nick for his Birthday, so _ is very grateful.
Jason showed Steven the proper techniques in order to care for Rayon.  _ was grateful.
Logan took time out of his day to show Matthew the proper way to clean a camera lens.  _ was grateful.
Jennifer was no longer homeless after Samantha took her in, _ was very grateful for the new shelter.
Joel was wealthy, so he bought Dennis a brand new car. _ felt very grateful.
Aaron volunteered to come over to Jeffrey's house to climb up the ladder to help hang his Christmas Lights.  _ was grateful.
After Angela got a perm, her hair was in poor condition. After Kayla offered to fix it, _ felt very grateful.
Emily gave extra time to help Laura with  cheerleading, as _ was very grateful for  help.
While caring for the elderly, Victoria cheerfully helped Samantha care for herself, and _ was grateful for her empathy.
Monica demonstrated to Katrina how to play YouTube videos without popup ads.  _ was grateful.
Benjamin told Lawrence that he would volunteer to calculate the company's retained earnings.  _ was grateful.
Aaron went to pick up Michael, who needed a ride to the airport, and _ was very grateful.
Katrina bought some catnip for Maria's brand new kitten which made _ feel very grateful.
Craig told Jeffrey that he would help him form an LLC.  _ was grateful.
Jennifer lent her favorite dress for Christine to wear at her prom, and _ was very grateful for it.
William showed Randy how to replace the paneling in his home.  _ was grateful.
After almost drowning Dennis was saved by Joel performing CPR on him. _ was very grateful.
The chronic acid reflux that Katrina had suffered from was relieved by Patricia, and _ was grateful.
The earthquake destroyed the house of Samuel, but not Jeffrey's, so _ is now very grateful.
The Mom of Betty has passed away, but Katrina's is still living, so _ is very grateful.
Dennis won a bunch of prizes for Ian at the carnival, so _ was grateful.
Sarah almost drowned while swimming at the pool, but Maria saved them, so _ was grateful.
Emily carried Patricia up four flights of stairs in the beachside condominium. _ was grateful.
Brett did the upholstery work on his new furniture for his friend Nick.  _ was grateful.
Monica bought the shea butter soap as a gift for Maria which made _ feel grateful.
Jessica often takes care of Natalie when they are sick and _ often feels grateful.
Rachel was upset she couldn't attend the funeral, so Amy offered to stream it for her; _ was grateful.
Kayla tried to stop Emily's nose bleed even though she was afraid of blood. _ was a grateful person.
Jessica attempted to help Rebecca with their problem.   _ was grateful for help.
Throughout high school, Rebecca struggled to find a skincare regime that kept pimps at bay. Natalie recommended all natural products. _ was grateful for the recommendation.
Jason gave Adam some chemicals to destroy the weeds in his garden. _ was grateful.
Dennis knew Justin was suffering from depression so he offered to listen for a while; _ felt grateful.
Randy told Leslie that he could easily replace the broken light bulb for him.  _ was grateful.
Brian taught Brett, his child, how to ride a bike and this made _ feel so grateful.
Monica showed Victoria how to successfully reinstall Windows XP without a CD.  _ was grateful.
Justin helped Kyle in the struggle of finally getting his private pilot's license and _ was grateful to him.
Ian found the camera that Ryan had lost at the beach, so _ felt grateful about being helped out.
After Matthew got knee surgery, Dennis helped them to get around, and _ was grateful to them for it.
Rebecca showed Jennifer how to heal a fever by herself.  _ sure was grateful for the help.
Samuel was recovering from pneumonia over the weekend with the help of Craig. _ was grateful.
William seemed to always be cleaning the dirty dishes even they from Jeffrey's meal. _ was thankful for  this.
It was employee appreciation day so Laura bought coffee for Carrie. _ was thankful for the appreciation.
Emily decided to puppy proof their house ahead of the adoption day of Maria's new puppy. _ was thankful for the hard work to ensure the puppy's safety.
Jessica appreciated everything that Megan did for them, because _ always tried to be a thankful person.
Brett bought Kevin dinner at a fancy Italian restaurant for his birthday, _ felt very thankful.
Felicia went to the local boutique to purchase a gift for Carrie, because _ wanted to thank her.
Michael came over and demonstrated to Eric the proper way to care for leather.  _ was thankful.
Maria bought an expensive piece of ruby jewelry for Jennifer because _ felt thankful to her.
Jeffrey asked Nick to help them make a workout routine. _ was thankful for getting the assistance.
Kevin had a head full of hair, but Steven was going bald, so _ was thankful for the thick locks.
Monica desperately needed a kidney transplant to live and luckily Tanya was willing to give theirs. _ was thankful.
The psychic said Lawrence had a positive aura and Robert had a negative aura, so _ thanked the psychic.
Justin was cured of their disorder after years of therapy from Nelson, which made _ thankful.
Mary got stranded along the side of the road, and Christine helped them, so _ was thankful.
When Tanya's dog ran away, Mary helped look for the dog. _ was very thankful.
Mary assists Katrina with her big moving day, which makes _ a really thankful friend.
Rebecca was making a homemade card for Carrie and wanted it to be perfect because _ was thankful.
Leslie was laying a concrete patio when Joel showed up to help.  _ was thankful for the assistance.
Aaron was piloting the airplane while Ian offered support, so _ was thankful for the help.
Ryan came over and helped Logan set up a Gmail account.  _ was thankful.
Nick was having his wisdom teeth out, so Christopher drove him to the dentist.  _ was thankful for the help.
Elena went to Mexico on vacation and brought back a poncho for Sarah. _ was thankful.
Emily went to pick up Jessica, who needed a ride to the train station, so _ was very grateful.
When choking, Lawrence helps save the life of Ryan. Because of this, _ is a grateful person.
Brian was able to afford the expensive watch at the store for Eric, so _ was grateful.
Ian had a pond in his backyard that Michael took great care of, so _ was grateful.
Jason was going to a job interview after being prepped by Logan. _ was grateful.
Kayla always feeds the goldfish because Monica forgets to. _ should be grateful the fish are still alive.
Brian helped Benjamin remove the bee hive from the yard. _ was grateful for the help.
Christopher told Samuel that he could help him build a composter this weekend.  _ was thankful.
Kevin worried about some hidden meanings when he received a compliment from Robert, but _ said thank you.
Neil agreed to help wash Adam's large dog, and _ was very grateful for the help.
The healthy man thanked Logan but not Robert because _ helped him change his life and become healthier.
Megan came over with special equipment and got rid of wasps from Elena's shed.  _ was thankful.
Adam thanked Nelson because _ remembered to give water and food to the new puppy in the morning.
Nick gave an orchid to Adam for his birthday which made _ feel very thankful.
Laura gave birth to twins and Tanya delivered them, so _ was sure to thank them when it was done.
Aaron was infected with bacteria, so Matthew gave them medication, and _ was soon thanked.
Betty bought a container for Lindsey for her birthday because _ wanted to thank her.
Angela loves to buy scratch offs for Cynthia whenever they get together and _ is very thankful.
As the walls began to cave in on Joseph, he thanked Craig who had sold him the house because _ had narrowly escaped due to his advice.
Lawrence was looking for ideas for cheap meals when Aaron showed them their cookbook.  _ was very thankful.
Donald came over to Kyle's garden and showed him the proper way to harvest garlic.  _ was thankful.
Patricia taught Mary how to eat healthy foods, and she followed it. _ felt grateful.
